notes.text:
This update for unzip fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-1000035: Fixed a heap-based buffer overflow in password protected ZIP archives (bsc#1080074)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A heap-based buffer overflow exists in Info-Zip UnZip version <= 6.00 in the processing of password-protected archives that allows an attacker to perform a denial of service or to possibly achieve code execution.
notes.title: CVE description
